TopicTitle: So say I wanted to do some music

Articles.Content:
I haven\'t written it yet, but I was thinking of adding some ambient music in-flight, perhaps a different one for the VAB

Are there any ways of doing this?

Are there even any code hooks for music in the game yet?

There\'s a MUSIC_VOLUME value in the settings.cfg, so maybe it\'s in there somewhere

EDIT:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/careers.php

Assuming you can find the music hook, I will be happy to make some music for the game.

I am a DJ and Producer, usually doing liquid trance-esque stuff. Just let me know if you want some stuff made. The nice thing about Trance is I can pull a halfway decent song out of my ass in 24 hours.

I haven\'t figured out how to get my stuff to play without diving into the code and editing stuph, but it looks like the resources folder will be the eventual place for it.

There\'s also a cute little thing in the sounds folder, and I recognise the cubase patches >.<

I don\'t want to apply for the job because I have only a small amount of experience and next to zero credit space.

(Although I would love the job to bits if I had it, it\'s a confidence thing.)

Just gonna suggest this sort of music if you\'re looking to add any to the game.

EDIT: Oops, necro-bumped? Sorry.
